alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:55PM CST until January 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Winter Storm to Impact the area on Friday into Saturday Morning... .A winter storm will sweep from north-northwest to south-southeast and deposit significant snow across parts of Iowa. Far eastern Nebraska will see lesser amounts. Travel may become difficult, especially on west/east roads in rural areas. Winds with gusts up to 40 mph, visibility will be reduced with blowing and drifting snow. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Harrison; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby
